name: map_cloud
description: Google Maps project hosted on GCP

scripts.compile:sass: sass sass/main.scss public/css/main.css && sass sass/simple.scss public/css/simple.css
scripts.build: npm run compile:sass && npm run compile:rollup
scripts.watch: nodemon --exec "npm run build && node app.js" -e js,scss,mustache --ignore node_modules/ --ignore public/

author: Gabor Csapo
